subject: Re: shop online
preview: Closing this task now. Got an approval to proceed with Xero Integration and added to the custom dev folder: PHQ - Integration of Xero to WooCommerce

full_threads.body: Closing this task now. Got an approval to proceed with Xero Integration and added to the custom dev folder: PHQ - Integration of Xero to WooCommerce
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Haris.

Here's the screen recording as per requested.

As for the security of Xero integration, our team has previously sent you this:
If you use a trusted app from the official Xero App Store, the risk is very low. Xero checks these apps carefully to make sure they meet high security standards.
To keep everything safe, here are a few tips:
  • Only use apps listed on Xero’s official site.
  • Turn on two-factor authentication (2FA) in your Xero account.
  • Check what data the app can access before connecting.
  • Remove any apps you no longer use.

The plugin I mentioned(WooCommerce + Xero integration) is among the list that was provided by the Xero App Store - Amaka.

If you have other preferred app, you can let me know and I can check it further.

Hi,

Can you do a screen recording on where to change prices for products.

Is the integration to Xero safe?

Haris
moutzouris

phone

(03) 5926 0729

website

http://www.poultryhq.com.au/

address

Building 2, 109-111 Craig Rd, Devon Meadows, Vic, 3977

Hi Haris!

To answer your questions:
  1. How do I access the new shop site editing, or is it the same?
    You can login through WordPress using the same credentials you are using in the live site.

  2. If I want to edit prices/products do I do it via WooCommerce or is there new site access?
    Product updates should now be done on the Shop website, not the main site.

  3. When we get orders through the shop now, are they still coming into WooCommerce? And if we migrate all existing orders will they and all new orders be able to be moved into Xero with the integration?
    Since we've now migrated the entire main website to the Shop website and updated the frontend, all new orders will be processed through WooCommerce on the Shop site. So moving forward, please check for new orders directly there.

    Regarding Xero integration: once it's set up, new orders can be automatically synced to Xero. For the migrated (past) orders, it's also possible to sync them using a plugin. I found one we can test: WooCommerce + Xero integration.

  4. Regarding the pop up its fine to go live with. Will it come up only on the poultry hq main page or the shop page as well?
    It will only be visible on the main website’s homepage, and the CTA will redirect users to the Shop website.

Let me know if you have any further questions or what the next steps will be, so I can schedule them accordingly.

Hi,

I have a few questions before I decide.


  1. How do I access the new shop site editing, or is it the same?




  1. If I want to edit prices/products do I do it via WooCommerce or is there new site access?




  1. When we get orders through the shop now, are they still coming into WooCommerce? And if we migrate all existing orders will they and all new orders be able to be moved into Xero with the integration?



Regarding the pop up its fine to go live with. Will it come up only on the poultry hq main page or the shop page as well?

Hi Haris.

Just a quick update:
  • The Shop page is now live and linked from the main website.
  • We’ve also updated all redirects to point to the Shop site, instead of the previous WooCommerce pages on the main site.

I’d like to check with you—would you prefer to migrate all existing orders from the main website to the new Shop site, or should we leave them as is?

Additionally, I’ve attached the popup we created for the promotion. Once you approve it, we’ll publish it on the homepage.

Lastly, regarding the Xero–WooCommerce integration, would you like us to proceed with setting this up for the Shop site? If yes, please let us know which app you'd prefer us to use, based on the reference Rica provided: Integrate Xero with WooCommerce.

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Just an update, we already have put the shop page live and linked from the main website.

We also updated all the redirects as well to link to the shop website instead of the Woocommerce pages in the main website.

I would like to check with you if you'd like to move all the orders that are on the main website to the shop site or we'll just leave it there.

Lastly, I have attached the popup that we created and once approved, we'll put it live on the homepage.

Also, regarding the integration of Xero to WooCommerce, would you like us to proceed and set it up to your shop website? If so, please let us know which app do you want us to integrate from the reference Rica has provided you: Integrate Xero with WooCommerce.

Thanks for confirming Haris!

We'll let you know once they have been completed.

action.text: Cindy Valderama assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Hi Haris.
I hope you had a great weekend!
Here's a quick update on the items we've completed as requested:
  • Updated the menu name in the header and footer to "Shop Online."
  • Updated the button in the Home Delivery carousel to "Shop Now."
    • Note: Removed the duplicated Google Review image that appeared above the button.
  • The Shop subdomain setup is now complete and ready for your review.
For the 10% off sale and $150 free delivery promotion-rather than placing it on the banner, would you prefer it to appear as a popup when users visit the site? The popup can include a Shop Now call-to-action and emphasize that the promotion is only valid for June. We'll disable it automatically once the promotion ends.
Once you've reviewed the Shop subdomain, please confirm if we can proceed with adding the correct links to your main website. We've already prepared the redirect links and will activate them upon your approval.
Moving forward, for faster assistance, please send any new requests to support@wolfiq.com.au.
Thanks again, and looking forward to your feedback!

On the bottom of the page the quick links still says Home delivery can we also change to shop online.

Also as we are running a 10% off sale on all orders over $150 with free delivery is there a banner that can come up on the page when someone enters or maybe put it on the carousel for the month of June as the first image.



Haris
